greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime of the form n^k + k^n, or 0 if no such prime exists.
comment: If p is a prime then a(p-1) = p, with k = 1.
a(11) has 3229 digits and is too long to include. See A243147 for k-values. - _Derek Orr_, Aug 10 2014
link: R. J. Cano (updated by Derek Orr), Additional Information
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 21 2002
ext: Extended and updated by _Derek Orr_, Aug 10 2014
